channel.title: Zaresslia - Quests || Achievements || Clue Scrolls || Economy || Unique Features
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s13.postimage.org/agagzh6af/Banner_8.gif[/img]
here to play http://zaresslia.com/
[B][U]Introduction:[/U][/B]
Zaresslia is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates, exciting content and friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community and help Zaresslia reach the very top. In order to Play or access the Downloads section, you must register an account on the forums and activate it via email.
[SPOILER=Features]
[COLOR="#00FF00"][B][U]..:Miscellaneous:..[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][U]Quests:[/U][/B]
• Tutorial Island. • Haven’t Got A Clue. • Lord Iban’s Return. • Dream Isle.
[B][U]Achievement Diaries:[/U][/B]
• Elite. • Advanced. • Beginner.
[B][U]Clue Scrolls:[/U][/B]
• Digging coordinates. • Equipment often required. • Rewards.
[B][U]Pets:[/U][/B]
• Kittens. • Cats. • Growing.
[B][U]Point Exchange:[/U][/B]
• A variety of fancy, useful and powerful items (check the images section to see what the shop contains).
[B][U]Tokkul Exchange:[/U][/B]
• Slayer token - Reset your current Slayer task with this item. • Boxing gloves - This item is as powerful as an iron dagger and contains 4 special attacks (which hits twice per special). • Ring of stone - This item will turn your character into a rock. • Golden tinderbox - If you use this item whilst Firemaking, you will frequently gain extra experience. • Golden hammer - If you use this item whilst Smithing, you will frequently gain extra experience.
[B][U]Lottery:[/U][/B]
• A ticket costs 2,000,000 Coins. • A winner is drawn at random once 25 tickets have been sold. The more tickets a player buys, the greater the chance they have in winning. However, the more tickets they buy, the less profit they'll make. • The winner is rewarded with 30,000,000 Coins. • 20,000,000 Coins is removed from the economy.
[B][U]Bank Pins:[/U][/B]
• Secure and help prevent items from getting stolen. • Any number from 0-9 can be used in the four digit pin. • The pin is saved to your character's account.
[B][U]Master Cape:[/U][/B]
• Costs 2,178,000 Coins (99,000 * 22 = 2,178,000). • Only players who have 99 in all 22 Skills can equip and buy this cape. • The Skillcape emote allows the player to fly.
[B][U]Rankings System:[/U][/B]
• Legend – Able to complete all of the Quests, able to complete of the Achievement Diaries, hard experience rates in all skills and receive 30 Zaresslia Points per 99. • Hero – Able to complete three out of four Quests, able to complete two out of three Achievement Diaries, medium experience rates in all skills and receive 15 Zaresslia Points per 99. • Champion – Able to complete two out of four Quests, able to complete one out of three Achievement Diaries, easier experience rates in all skill and receive 10 Zaresslia Points per 99.
[B][U]Bosses:[/U][/B]
• Godwars. • King Black Dragon. • Dagannoth Kings. • Chaos Elemental. • Kalphite Queen. • Barrelchest. • Dad.
[B][U]Minigames:[/U][/B]
• Barrows. • Pest Control. • Fight Caves. • Fight Pits. • Fun PK.
[B][U]Other:[/U][/B]
• Skilling Isle. • Donor City. • Donor Store. • Active Pking areas. • Great economy. • Fixed private messaging. • Voting system with rewards. • Hiscores. • Webclient. • Downloadable client. • Resizable and fixed screen options. • Daily updates. • 24/7. • IPB Forums. • 474 with exceptions of a few items.
[COLOR="#00FF00"][B][U]..:Combat:..[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][U]Melee:[/U][/B]
• Perfect bonuses and formulas. • Perfect damaging and accuracy. • Special attacks. • Barrows equipment with special effects. • Equipment requirements. • Following. • Player VS Player. • Player VS NPC.
[B][U]Ranged:[/U][/B]
• Perfect bonuses and formulas. • Perfect damaging and accuracy. • Special attacks. • Three attack styles which are accurate, rapid and long range. • Javelins, throwing axes, knives and darts. • Dragon bolts (e), onyx bolts (e), diamond bolts (e) and ruby bolts (e). • Following. • Distancing. • Player VS Player. • Player VS NPC.
[B][U]Prayer:[/U][/B]
• Bone burying. • Bone on altars. • Regular prayers. • Draining. • Bonuses.
[B][U]Magic:[/U][/B]
• Perfect bonuses and formulas. • Perfect amaging and accuracy. • Autocasting. • Freezing timers. • Teleblock timers. • Weakening spells. • Regular magicks. • Ancient magicks. • Lunar magicks. • Following. • Player VS Player. • Player VS NPC.
[COLOR="#00FF00"][B][U]..:Other Skills:..[/U][/B][/COLOR]
[B][U]Runecrafting:[/U][/B]
• Altars. • Multiple crafting. • Pouches.  Correct animations. • Correct GFX.
[B][U]Agility:[/U][/B]
• Gnome agility course. • No mass clicking. • Return back to your original movement style. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Herblore:[/U][/B]
• Potion formulas. • Herbs and ingredients. • Cleaning. • Decanting. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Thieving:[/U][/B]
• Stalls. • Pickpocketing. • Stunning. • Cage random event. • Correct animations. • Correct GFX.
[B][U]Crafting:[/U][/B]
• Gems to amulets. • Dragon leathers to dragon hides. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Fletching:[/U][/B]
• Logs to bows. • Arrow making. • Bolt making. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Slayer:[/U][/B]
• Enchanted gem. • Masters. • Monster requirements. • Elite tasks. • Hard tasks. • Medium tasks. • Easy tasks.
[B][U]Mining:[/U][/B]
• All ores obtainable. • Prospecting. • Gem findings. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Smithing:[/U][/B]
• All bars obtainable. • All armours and items smithable. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Fishing:[/U][/B]
• All fish catchable. • Net, big net, lobster pot and harpoon fishing. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Cooking:[/U][/B]
• All fish cookable. • Burning. • Cooking gauntlets. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Woodcutting:[/U][/B]
• All trees cutable. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Firemaking:[/U][/B]
• All logs burnable. • Fire making. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Farming:[/U][/B]
• Raking. • Watering. • Planting. • Growing. • Picking. • Correct animations.
[B][U]Hunter:[/U][/B]
• Implings catchable. • Loot sellable. • Correct animations.
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Videos] [CENTER][B][COLOR="#FF0000"][U]Note:[/U][/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*] All of the clips used in the video below belongs to Zaresslia. [*] All of the clips used below was recorded after the server was released. [*] Not all of the features of Zaresslia are used in the video, however some clips of the server which I feel are important have been.[/ul]
[B][U]Promotional Video:[/U][/B]
[video=youtube;2QJjQOBB7ws]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2QJjQOBB7ws[/video][/CENTER][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Images] [CENTER][B][COLOR="#FF0000"][U]Note:[/U][/COLOR][/B]
[ul][*] All of the images below belongs to Zaresslia. [*] All of the images below was taken before the server was released. [*] Not all of the features of Zaresslia has been posted as an image, however some images of the server which I feel are important have been.[/ul]
[B][U]Pets:[/U][/B]

item.dc:creator: @Steso Steso
item.description:
@Steso wrote:

[CENTER]

here to play http://zaresslia.com/

Introduction:

Zaresslia is a Runescape Private Server that inspires a variety of people to play due to the daily updates, exciting content and friendly staff team. Players of all different ages and backgrounds have the opportunity to fit in nicely with the community and help Zaresslia reach the very top. In order to Play or access the Downloads section, you must register an account on the forums and activate it via email.

[SPOILER=Features]

[COLOR="#00FF00"]…:Miscellaneous:…[/COLOR]

Quests:

• Tutorial Island.
• Haven’t Got A Clue.
• Lord Iban’s Return.
• Dream Isle.

Achievement Diaries:

• Elite.
• Advanced.
• Beginner.

Clue Scrolls:

• Digging coordinates.
• Equipment often required.
• Rewards.

Pets:

• Kittens.
• Cats.
• Growing.

Point Exchange:

• A variety of fancy, useful and powerful items (check the images section to see what the shop contains).

Tokkul Exchange:

• Slayer token - Reset your current Slayer task with this item.
• Boxing gloves - This item is as powerful as an iron dagger and contains 4 special attacks (which hits twice per special).
• Ring of stone - This item will turn your character into a rock.
• Golden tinderbox - If you use this item whilst Firemaking, you will frequently gain extra experience.
• Golden hammer - If you use this item whilst Smithing, you will frequently gain extra experience.

Lottery:

• A ticket costs 2,000,000 Coins.
• A winner is drawn at random once 25 tickets have been sold. The more tickets a player buys, the greater the chance they have in winning. However, the more tickets they buy, the less profit they’ll make.
• The winner is rewarded with 30,000,000 Coins.
• 20,000,000 Coins is removed from the economy.

Bank Pins:

• Secure and help prevent items from getting stolen.
• Any number from 0-9 can be used in the four digit pin.
• The pin is saved to your character’s account.

Master Cape:

• Costs 2,178,000 Coins (99,000 * 22 = 2,178,000).
• Only players who have 99 in all 22 Skills can equip and buy this cape.
• The Skillcape emote allows the player to fly.

Rankings System:

• Legend – Able to complete all of the Quests, able to complete of the Achievement Diaries, hard experience rates in all skills and receive 30 Zaresslia Points per 99.
• Hero – Able to complete three out of four Quests, able to complete two out of three Achievement Diaries, medium experience rates in all skills and receive 15 Zaresslia Points per 99.
• Champion – Able to complete two out of four Quests, able to complete one out of three Achievement Diaries, easier experience rates in all skill and receive 10 Zaresslia Points per 99.

Bosses:

• Godwars.
• King Black Dragon.
• Dagannoth Kings.
• Chaos Elemental.
• Kalphite Queen.
• Barrelchest.
• Dad.

Minigames:

• Barrows.
• Pest Control.
• Fight Caves.
• Fight Pits.
• Fun PK.

Other:

• Skilling Isle.
• Donor City.
• Donor Store.
• Active Pking areas.
• Great economy.
• Fixed private messaging.
• Voting system with rewards.
• Hiscores.
• Webclient.
• Downloadable client.
• Resizable and fixed screen options.
• Daily updates.
• 24/7.
• IPB Forums.
• 474 with exceptions of a few items.

[COLOR="#00FF00"]…:Combat:…[/COLOR]

Melee:

• Perfect bonuses and formulas.
• Perfect damaging and accuracy.
• Special attacks.
• Barrows equipment with special effects.
• Equipment requirements.
• Following.
• Player VS Player.
• Player VS NPC.

Ranged:

• Perfect bonuses and formulas.
• Perfect damaging and accuracy.
• Special attacks.
• Three attack styles which are accurate, rapid and long range.
• Javelins, throwing axes, knives and darts.
• Dragon bolts (e), onyx bolts (e), diamond bolts (e) and ruby bolts (e).
• Following.
• Distancing.
• Player VS Player.
• Player VS NPC.

Prayer:

• Bone burying.
• Bone on altars.
• Regular prayers.
• Draining.
• Bonuses.

Magic:

• Perfect bonuses and formulas.
• Perfect amaging and accuracy.
• Autocasting.
• Freezing timers.
• Teleblock timers.
• Weakening spells.
• Regular magicks.
• Ancient magicks.
